definition[0]: used to emphasize the most important reason or fact about something, or a simple explanation of something
example[1]: Well, basically, it’s a matter of filling in a few forms.
example[2]: I used to see him every night, basically.
definition[1]: in the main or most important ways, without considering additional details or differences
example[3]: All cheeses are made in basically the same way.
example[4]: I believe that human beings are basically good.
example[5]: Basically, he hadn’t changed at all.
